book.synopsis: A realistic depiction of World War III combat follows Captain Sean Bannion and the tank soldiers of Team Yankee as they battle the Russian invasion force, from Hill 214 in West Germany to the ultimate cease-fire. Reissue.
book.dimensions: Height: 6.76 Inches, Length: 4.24 Inches, Weight: 1.01 Pounds, Width: 0.95 Inches
